title: Generate Vessel Performance Report
description: After a vessel departs, an analyst needs to create a performance report for the shipping line, detailing the productivity achieved during its port call.

tasks.description: Retrieve all key timestamps for the vessel's visit (e.g., arrival, first line, operations start, operations end, departure).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst pulls the complete event timeline for the vessel from the TOS.

tasks.description: Calculate key performance indicators (KPIs) such as crane intensity, gross crane productivity (GCP), and berth productivity.
tasks.expected_outcome: All standard KPIs are accurately calculated.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report and send it to the shipping line.
tasks.expected_outcome: A standardized performance report is created and emailed to the customer.
